title: Festival in Edinburgh
creator_credit: Douglas Clarke, Howard Thomas and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: Scenes from the 1954 Edinburgh Festival of music and drama, including a short sequence showing Margot Fonteyn and Michael Somes dancing ‘The Firebird’, Ann Todd and Paul Rogers in a scene from Macbeth, Sir Adrian Boult conducting the National Youth Orchestra and before the castle.
